objects.specification: A broad rectangular floor surface sized to comfortably fit a demo car and walking space around. It has a flat, sturdy construction with a subtle matte finish in neutral gray, resembling polished concrete or high-density laminate to ensure durability and a refined exhibition look.

A tall back wall forming the rear boundary of the booth, featuring a smooth surface and neutral light gray color. The wall has a consistent thickness and is high enough to create an enclosed, professional fair environment.

A front wall with a large central entrance opening for visitor access. It matches the back wall in height and thickness and is finished in the same neutral light gray, with two wide side panels framing the opening to maintain a cohesive and inviting façade.

A left-side perimeter wall matching the design and height of the other walls, finished in neutral light gray. It creates an enclosed side of the booth and provides mounting space for display elements.
A right-side perimeter wall consistent with the other walls in height, thickness, and light gray finish, enclosing the booth space and serving as a backdrop for mounted displays or banners.

A highly detailed 3D demo car model with a sleek aerodynamic design and glossy paint finish. It features realistic wheels, tinted windows, and brand-specific styling cues. The car is centered on the booth floor and oriented to face directly toward the entrance to maximize visitor impact.

A modern reception desk positioned near the entrance, featuring a clean rectangular profile and matte dark gray finish. It has a subtle branded accent stripe and ample counter space for staff interaction and brochure display.

A slim display stand with a sturdy base and neutral gray finish, designed to showcase car accessories or informational brochures. It features a flat top surface and subtle edge detailing for a refined exhibition look.

A slim display stand with a sturdy base and neutral gray finish, designed to showcase car accessories or informational brochures. It features a flat top surface and subtle edge detailing for a refined exhibition look.

A slim display stand with a sturdy base and neutral gray finish, designed to showcase car accessories or informational brochures. It features a flat top surface and subtle edge detailing for a refined exhibition look.
A tall vertical banner stand with a slim metal frame and vibrant car-brand graphic wrap. It has a sturdy base and eye-catching design elements to reinforce branding at the booth corners.
A tall vertical banner stand with a slim metal frame and vibrant car-brand graphic wrap. It has a sturdy base and eye-catching design elements to reinforce branding at the booth corners.

A sleek hanging lighting fixture with a minimalistic metal housing and bright LED element. It is designed to cast focused light downward, highlighting the demo car and surrounding displays with crisp white illumination.

A sleek hanging lighting fixture with a minimalistic metal housing and bright LED element. It is designed to cast focused light downward, highlighting the demo car and surrounding displays with crisp white illumination.

A sleek hanging lighting fixture with a minimalistic metal housing and bright LED element. It is designed to cast focused light downward, highlighting the demo car and surrounding displays with crisp white illumination.

A sleek hanging lighting fixture with a minimalistic metal housing and bright LED element. It is designed to cast focused light downward, highlighting the demo car and surrounding displays with crisp white illumination.

A comfortable seating area featuring two small coffee tables with wooden tops and metal legs, accompanied by eight modern chairs with upholstered seats in dark gray. The arrangement provides a quiet corner for visitors to rest, discuss, or review brochures.
A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage in a modern ceramic planter. It adds a touch of natural vibrancy and softens the booth corners.
